panels.description: This KPI shows the percentage of success when a user tries to establish a connection in 5G SA mode.

settings.script: if (params.am55124c01031 == null || params.am55125c02501 == null) { return null } else if ((params.m55124c01001 + params.m55124c01002 + params.m55124c01003 + params.m55124c01004 + params.m55124c01005 + params.m55124c01006 + params.m55124c01014 + params.m55124c01015 + params.m55124c01016 + params.m55124c01017 + params.m55124c00502) == 0 || (params.m55125c02501) == 0 || (params.m55124c01031) == 0) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.m55124c01031)/(params.m55124c01001 + params.m55124c01002 + params.m55124c01003 + params.m55124c01004 + params.m55124c01005 + params.m55124c01006 + params.m55124c01014 + params.m55124c01015 + params.m55124c01016 + params.m55124c01017 + params.m55124c00502)*(params.m55125c02502)/(params.m55125c02501)*(params.m55125c00001)/(params.m55124c01031) }

panels.title: NR_5151a 5G SA Accessibility success ratio / SA access SR [%]

panels.description: This KPI shows the percentage of NGAP Initial UE Message sent from gNB after RRC Connection attempts that were successfully completed.

settings.script: if (params.am55125c00001 == null || params.am55124c01031 == null) { return null } else if ((params.m55124c01031) == 0) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.m55125c00001)/(params.m55124c01031) }

panels.title: NR_1224a 5G SA Initial UE message sent success ratio / SA Init UE msg sent SR [%]

panels.description:
This KPI shows the NGAP connection establishment success ratio.
The KPI value is expected to be clearly lower than 100% as there is no Init context setup request message after an Initial UE message for pure signaling connection (e.g Registration).

settings.script: if (params.inPackets == null || params.outOctets == null) { return null }

panels.title: Port Stats [no. of packets]

panels.description: This KPI shows the physical port counters
panels.title: PortStatsOutOctets

panels.description: This KPI shows the Operational State of the physical ports

panels.title: VRFIfaceState

panels.description: This KPI shows the available memory in the system
panels.title: SysAvailMem

panels.description: This KPI shows the memory used by the system
